pkgmetadata.longdescription: Practical Item Response Theory and Computer-Based Testing in R // An implementation of item response theory and computer-based testing based on the 3-parameter-logistic (3PL) model, with functions to perform (i) parameter estimation, (2) automated test assembly, (3) computerized adaptive testing (CAT) simulation, and (4) multistage assembly and simulation. More documentation at https://github.com/xluo11/xxIRT.
